name: Glow Daily Vitamin C Gel Cream
about: What it is:A lightweight gel cream that is formulated with vitamin C and magnesium to smooth, hydrate, brighten, and energize the look of skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin C: Brightens the skin‚Äôs appearance..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:The Radiance Glow Daily Vitamin C Gel Cream is REN Clean Skincare‚Äôs much-loved Radiance Moisturizer with a vegan and 100 percent zero-waste upgrade. It delivers lightweight hydration while visibly evening skin tone and protecting skin from environmental pollution. It also contains vitamin C to help energize and moisturize for a plumper-looking and glowing complexion..Research results:
ingredients: -Vitamin C: Visibly brightens the complexion..-Magnesium: Nourishes skin..-Tara Pod Extract: Helps even skin tone...Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Glycerin, Lauryl Laurate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Tapioca Starch, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Hydroxyacetophenone, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Glycogen, Hippopha√´ Rhamnoides Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Oil, Parfum* (Fragrance), Tocopherol, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Diglucosyl Gallic Acid, Ammonium Bicarbonate, Glucose, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Citral, Limonene, Linalool..* 100% Natural Fragrance‚ÄîParfum 100% Naturel....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-AM and PM, massage onto a freshly cleansed face and neck until absorbed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I love how light it is and smooth on my skin. I put it on at night and I wake up with my skin super refreshed, especially in this harsh winter. I put it on in the morning as well, because the refreshing citrus sent is light and energizing.

reviews.review_title: It‚Äôs a no-go for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this product. Either REN changed the formula or I became allergic because my entire face broke out with a red hot rash after application. I do not recommend this if you have sensitive skin or prone to contact dermatitis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually change moisturizers after I‚Äôm done with the product but this one has become a staple. The scent is amazing, it literally smells like you‚Äôre peeling an orange and it leaves my skin very soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first & up until now only under eye treatment which as visibly reduced my dark circles. Woke up one morning forgetting I even added this to my skincare regimen and went ¬´  Wow! ¬ª in the mirror. I definitely look a lot more well rested. Only downsize is the price which is a bit on the higher side for me, but since it‚Äôs also an eco responsible product, I feel it‚Äôs worth it

reviews.review_text: This did nothing for my skin whatsoever. It smells nice though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dry skin with texture. Been using this for a few months in the morning as my daily moisturizer, spf on top of course. I haven‚Äôt noticed a difference. If I stop using it for 2 weeks and come back, no big change. Not very moisturizing and can‚Äôt tell it has vitamin c. I might need an essence or serum with a little more oomph but this was just ehhh. Not bad, not good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeee this product! I have consistently used this product for about 6 months everyday, some times twice a day and I can see a clear difference in my skin tone and discoloration. My skin is clear and mostly even, I don‚Äôt ever want to stop using this product!

reviews.review_text: I waited one month to write this review - it's incredible! My skin is glowing and hydrated. Perfect for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. It isn‚Äôt too heavy, brightens my skin and smells so good.

reviews.review_text: My all time favorite moisturizer! I love the texture, the smell, how it quickly absorbs into the skin and hydrates. I've not had any problems with dry skin since using this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I start using it couple weeks ago.. it‚Äôs good but its kinda sticky. It doesnt really glide on your skin It didnt do much for me  I think the vitamin C serum will be better. Overall not a bad product if you are starting to incorporate vitamin c in your routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum so much it goes in so nicely and great for hyper pigmentation on my skin I have very sensitive skin and this was great and I am really think vitamin C is one of the essential part of your skin regimen for everyone to have. I highly recommend trying this out if you have been looking for something to brighten your skin and lesson hyper pigmentation. This was complimentary from REN Skincare!

reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ren. I am loving this serum. Feels so light and silky and absorbs into the skin so nicely. Makes my skin so glowy and radiant. My skin has definitely improved since using this‚Äîsmooth and healthy. Will definitely be purchasing again.

reviews.review_text: so good left my skin feeling a glowy and vibrant but also can cause some pilling when u add sunscreen or a primer in the morning this product was received for free by rea beauty overall very good and gifted by ren skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this vitamin c serum. It‚Äôs such an important step in your skincare routine and I‚Äôm obsessed with this one. I will definitely be recommending this to all of my family and friends to try this.  complimentary from REN skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This vitamin C serum is very smooth and light weight. There's no irritation and is not sticky on skin. Excited to continue to use this to brighten, even out skin, and smooth texture. Works well both in morning and night routines! Gifted by REN Skincare in exchange for review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Ren Skincare. I love this radiance vitamin C serum, I use this AM & PM. I apply a pea-sized amount and press it all over mg face. I love that this helps me with my dark spots and even out my skin tone. It feels light and makes a difference with my skin‚Äôs firmness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Needed a new vitamin c serum and so far this one that I was gifted by REN skincare has been great! It‚Äôs not sticky like others I‚Äôve used in the past and it‚Äôs been a great addition to my morning routine.  Leave my skin soft, smooth and looking brighter and more even each day! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of this serum - it‚Äôs milky rather than clear and goes on very smoothly. The glow is instant and stays on whole day . I am using it both AM and PM . The smell could have been better though. This was complimentary from REN skincare

Gifted by ren skincare  I like the texture of this serum! It is lightweight and is absorbed quickly. This has amazing ingredients such as licorice extract, vitamin c from corn, and wild Canadian rumex. My skin felt hydrated, brightened, but also soothed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I haven‚Äôt tried many REN  Skincare products, but I was gifted by REN Skincare this Vitamin C Serum. I love that this is super fruit powered with Kakadu Plum( + Vitamin C to help brighten the skin) Dragon Fruit(prebiotics & minerals to strengthen skin barrier) and Pomegranate(Omega 5 to help soothe & protect). It has a nice scent, a little goes a long way and it is fast absorbing on the skin. I‚Äô all for a good brightening serum. My skin can‚Äôt get enough Vitamin C.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Ren skincare. This is a venture powerful vitamin c, I love it! I purge a little bit during the first week but as soon as my skin got used to it, it did a beautiful job illuminating the skin. It gives a very fresh appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is amazing, the best vitamin C I have used in a long rime. I love that it is lightweight enough to use everyday. It does it‚Äôs job by brightening my skin and giving it a glow, but I also feel like it provides hydration for my skin that other vitamin C serums don‚Äôt. I would definitely recommend this product. This procure was gifted by REN Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Ren products & gifted by REN skincare. I have a few of their products that I use regularly. This is a lightweight superfruit serum that actually brightens and even outs your skin in about 2 weeks. It also has antioxidants that work to protect your skin from free radicals that are harmful to your skin. This potent serum has Kakadu Plum, Dragon Fruit, Pomegranate, Polyphenols and Vitamin E‚Äôs antioxidants!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Started using the Radiance Vitamin C Glow Serum, I really like it so far. Beautiful and light texture and  doesn't feel sticky or heavy on the skin after applying it. It gives a really nice glow to my skin I use it in  my morning and evening routine. I got the product complimentary from REN Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this was gifted to me by Ren Skincare. So thank you! First off, smells so good lol. I know random, but the dragon fruit and pomegranate gives it a delightful aroma. Second is suitable for sensitive skin which I have due to allergies. Plus vitamin c is absolutely amazing for evening out your skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vitamin c is one of my favorite skin care steps, so it‚Äôs important that I reallly love the one I‚Äôm using. This one fits that spectrum! I love that it‚Äôs a zero waste product, and it makes my skin glow! My skin legit sucks this stuff up I was gifted by ren skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Live dthis product on my skin. It was gifted by ren skincare. It was very hydrating even though its a vitamin C product. I loved the consistency. I would definitely recommend this product for people with hyperpigmentation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This vitamin C is so effective and gentle to the skin barrier. My hyper pigmentation has significantly reduced and my overall complexion has evened out and appears bright and fresh. I literally can‚Äôt do without this vitamin c!! This product was gifted by REN Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loveeee this Vitamin C serum and i have used over 15 other brands and this is one of the best ones out there. The texture is great, not sticky or oily on the skin. I can wear it under my makeup without it getting oily during the day. I have seen a great improvement in my sun spots as well as old acne scars from the past. I love how bright and even my skin looks. I will continue using this. This was gifted by REN skincare, but the opinion is my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was complimentary from REN Skincare and I needed a new Vitamin C serum and this one did not disappoint. Love the superfruit infused ingredients and LOVE the zero waste packaging (yay sustainability). Been using this every morning as a part of my routine and my skin looks brighter already! I love the consistency of the product and the lack of a residue on my skin :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can‚Äôt wear under make up, it pills and gets clunky. Ok before bed, still waiting on results. Don‚Äôt love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is AMAZING!!! If you have normal, combo or oily skin, this is perfect for you!!! Hydrating enough, good for sensitive skin and that RADIANT skin!! Really worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a game changer. I am getting compliments from men and women that my skin looks flawless. this moisturizer feels amazing on my combination skin. I have tried a similar moisturizer claiming the same things but was too drying. this one is perfect for me. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had such high expectations for this one since I LOVE Ren products, and I thought it would simplify my morning routine by combining two products into one, but it really isn't hydrating enough. It gripped onto my dry patches so I had to layer another moisturizer on top and then use SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I still don‚Äôt know if it makes a difference to the skin or not because I didn‚Äôt use it on regular basis. However the formula is so light and absorbs right away. It‚Äôs perfect for morning use and under make up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The REN Glow Daily Moisturizer with vitamin c is a lightweight moisturizer that doesn't feel sticky, oily or thick on the skin. I've used it on it's own and under my spf. After a couple weeks of use my skin does look a little more brighter. I like that it's a clean product and I like the packaging. Only con is that I have dry skin and it gets worse in the winter and I don't think this product would provide enough moisture for me on the cold months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this lightweight moisturizer for my skin. After a few weeks of use I can definitely tell my skin is feeling more firm. I also love that this product does not feel heavy or greasy on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! Been using for a few weeks now and i have already seen an improvement in my rine lines around my eyes! I keep mine in the fridge so it feels so soothing in the morning!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 3 weeks and I love it. It smells great. Very light not heavy. My face feels nice and soft. Not oily. I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Glow Daily Vitamin C Gel Cream Moisturizer for 3 weeks now. The moisturizer has a slight orange scent to it, which is very refreshing. My skin is very dry, and it gets worse during the winter. It has helped my dry spots and also give my skin a glow, which is great during the dull, dry months. It doesn't leave any film or stickiness on your skin. I love it and will keep it in my daily skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was very happy after using this product for a couple of weeks to see my skin is moisturized, especially during dry weather now, and is definitely brighter - it just glows. Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pros -amazing relaxing citrus scent -super creamy formula -wears well under make-up -super moisturizing  Cons -the pump fails  I have super dry skin and was excited to try this product.  It did not disappoint.  I saw a noticeable difference in my skin after just a few days.  Unfortunately that was all I was able to use it for as the pump failed and as hard as I have tried I cannot get it to work.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! Been using for a few weeks now and i have already seen an improvement in my rine lines around my eyes! I keep mine in the fridge so it feels so soothing in the morning!!
